files.content: "use client" import React from "react" import { CalendarIcon } from "lucide-react" import { DateRangePicker as AriaDateRangePicker, DateRangePickerProps as AriaDateRangePickerProps, DateValue, ValidationResult, } from "react-aria-components" import { composeTailwindRenderProps } from "../lib/utils" import { DateInput } from "./date-field" import { Dialog } from "./dialog" import { FieldDescription, FieldError, FieldLabel } from "./field" import { InputGroup, InputGroupAddon, InputGroupButton, inputGroupInputStyles, } from "./input-group" import { Popover } from "./popover" import { RangeCalendar } from "./range-calendar" export interface DateRangePickerProps extends AriaDateRangePickerProps { label?: string description?: string errorMessage?: string | ((validation: ValidationResult) => string) } export function DateRangePicker({ label, description, errorMessage, ...props }: DateRangePickerProps) { return ( {label && {label}} â€“ {description && {description}} {errorMessage} ) }
